name: Sekiroâ„¢: Shadows Die Twice
notes:
Steam > Steam > Settings > In-Game > Uncheck "Enable the Steam Overlay while in-game"
Then run this installer
content:
game:
  appid: 814380
  prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
installer:
- task:
    app: cjkfonts
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    app: dinput8
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
system:
  env:
    DXVK_HUD: 0
  pulse_latency: true
winesteam:
  dxvk: true
  overrides:
    xaudio2_7: native,builtin
  version: tkg-protonified-4.4-x86_64
